displayProperties.description: Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.
displayProperties.name: Towering Barricade

displayProperties.description: Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases reload speed for your equipped weapon when you stand behind it.
displayProperties.name: Rally Barricade

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air to greater heights.
displayProperties.name: High Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Lift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Lift and launch into the air with a strong initial burst of momentum.
displayProperties.name: Catapult Lift

displayProperties.description: A grenade that sticks to any surface and emits bolts of lightning.
displayProperties.name: Lightning Grenade

displayProperties.description: An explosive grenade that disorients enemies it damages.
displayProperties.name: Flashbang Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that periodically damages enemies inside its explosion radius.
displayProperties.name: Pulse Grenade

displayProperties.description: Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom.
displayProperties.name: Fists of Havoc

displayProperties.description: After sprinting, for a short time, use this Melee ability to slam shoulder-first into your target and release an Arc explosion on impact.
displayProperties.name: Seismic Strike

displayProperties.description: Damaging enemies with Seismic Strike recharges your grenade.
displayProperties.name: Aftershocks

displayProperties.description: Gain an additional grenade charge. Increases the duration of grenade effects.
displayProperties.name: Magnitude

displayProperties.description: Fists of Havoc's ground slam attack leaves a damage-dealing field in its wake and deals more damage the longer it's in the air.
displayProperties.name: Terminal Velocity

displayProperties.description: Strike an enemy with this melee ability to reload your weapon and increase both your weapon stability and weapon damage.
displayProperties.name: Frontal Assault

displayProperties.description: Melee kills immediately trigger health regeneration.
displayProperties.name: Reversal

displayProperties.description: Critically wounding an enemy or breaking their shields increases your melee range and damage.
displayProperties.name: Knockout

displayProperties.description: Destroying enemies with Fists of Havoc extends its duration.
displayProperties.name: Trample

displayProperties.description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into enemies to inflict meteoric damage.
displayProperties.name: Thundercrash

displayProperties.description: After sprinting, leap into the air and press  to slam into the ground and damage nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Ballistic Slam

displayProperties.description: Hitting enemies with Ballistic Slam grants Super energy and activates Inertia Override.
displayProperties.name: Impact Conversion

displayProperties.description: Picking up ammo during a slide reloads your equipped weapon and increases weapon damage for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Inertia Override
